text: Forest Department officials seized 14 kg of sandalwood logs from a person in Sithaandapuram reserve forest area on Thursday. The logs were seized from Raman (27) of Seenkottai village in Denkanikottai while he was found carrying it in a gunny bag. Accordin to sources, the accused attempted a get-away by pushing down a forest watcher, when he was over powered and arrested.
title: Sandalwood logs seized
